verses.roman:
maryādā rākhile, tuṣṭa kaile mora mana
tumi aiche nā karile kare kon jana?"

synonyms: maryādā rākhile—since you have observed the etiquette; tuṣṭa kaile—you have satisfied; mora mana—My mind; tumi—you; aiche—like that; nā karile—without doing; kare—would do; kon jana—who.
translation: "By observing the etiquette, you have satisfied My mind. Who else but you will show this example?"
